author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1388580 from trunk to branch-2.0.2-alpha to fix YARN-88. DefaultContainerExecutor can fail to set proper permissions. Contributed by Jason Lowe.

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1386838 from trunk to branch-2.0.2-alpha to fix YARN-108. FSDownload can create cache directories with the wrong permissions. Contributed by Jason Lowe.

author: cmpilato
msg: Merge a comment typo (obvious) fix from trunk (r1391935).

author: cmpilato
msg: (add_memcache_server): Fix a silly braino which from trying to save
a line of code ("ms" is milliseconds, not microseconds).  While
here, go ahead and flesh out the errant comment for readability.
(Which was pretty much the way the original patch provider had it.)

author: acmurthy
msg: Merge -c 1391679 from trunk to branch-2.0.2-alpha to fix MAPREDUCE-4689. JobClient.getMapTaskReports on failed job results in NPE. Contributed by Jason Lowe.
